The Boeing 737-300 is the first official family difference in the 737 family.

Trivia

  • While now part of the Classic series, these planes were called the "Next Generation" planes (now taken by the third generation of 737s).
  • The prototype of the -300 is the 1,001st 737 plane that were built up to that point.
